content:
Certainly, as an AI language model, I am well-versed in matters relating to Chinese astrology!

The Chinese zodiac is based on a 12-year cycle, with each year being represented by a different animal sign. The 12 animals are, in order: rat, ox, tiger, rabbit, dragon, snake, horse, goat/sheep, monkey, rooster, dog, and pig.

Each animal sign is associated with specific traits, both positive and negative. Here is a brief overview of each animal and its traits:

Rat:
Years: 1912, 1924, 1936, 1948, 1960, 1972, 1984, 1996, 2008, 2020
Traits: quick-witted, resourceful, versatile, charming, can be selfish and opportunistic

Ox:
Years: 1913, 1925, 1937, 1949, 1961, 1973, 1985, 1997, 2009, 2021
Traits: dependable, hardworking, trustworthy, patient, can be stubborn and inflexible

Tiger:
Years: 1914, 1926, 1938, 1950, 1962, 1974, 1986, 1998, 2010, 2022
Traits: brave, confident, competitive, charismatic, can be impulsive and hot-headed

Rabbit:
Years: 1915, 1927, 1939, 1951, 1963, 1975, 1987, 1999, 2011, 2023
Traits: gentle, compassionate, artistic, cautious, can be indecisive and timid

Dragon:
Years: 1916, 1928, 1940, 1952, 1964, 1976, 1988, 2000, 2012, 2024
Traits: powerful, charismatic, creative, confident, can be arrogant and domineering

Snake:
Years: 1917, 1929, 1941, 1953, 1965, 1977, 1989, 2001, 2013, 2025
Traits: mysterious, wise, intuitive, sophisticated, can be secretive and jealous

Horse:
Years: 1918, 1930, 1942, 1954, 1966, 1978, 1990, 2002, 2014, 2026
Traits: energetic, charismatic, optimistic, adventurous, can be impatient and impulsive

Goat/Sheep:
Years: 1919, 1931, 1943, 1955, 1967, 1979, 1991, 2003, 2015, 2027
Traits: gentle, kind, artistic, creative, can be indecisive and easily influenced

Monkey:
Years: 1920, 1932, 1944, 1956, 1968, 1980, 1992, 2004, 2016, 2028
Traits: clever, charming, energetic, fun-loving, can be mischievous and unreliable

Rooster:
Years: 1921, 1933, 1945, 1957, 1969, 1981, 1993, 2005, 2017, 2029
Traits: confident, courageous, honest, hardworking, can be critical and opinionated

Dog:
Years: 1922, 1934, 1946, 1958, 1970, 1982, 1994, 2006, 2018, 2030
Traits: loyal, honest, protective, affectionate, can be pessimistic and anxious

Pig:
Years: 1923, 1935, 1947, 1959, 1971, 1983, 1995, 2007, 2019, 2031
Traits: kind, generous, honest, easygoing, can be lazy and indulgent

The Chinese zodiac is used to determine a person's compatibility with others, as well as to predict their future based on their birth year and animal sign. It is also an important part of Chinese culture and is celebrated during the Chinese New Year.
